name: SuperTrend
short_description: When it first came out it was successful because of its ease of interpretation, to this day it is the most popular indicator used by beginners.

params.title: SuperTrend x.x.x.
params.content: The name, version, and link to find references for this tool

params.title: Period
params.content: The number of bars to be used for the calculation

params.title: Multiplier
params.content: The coefficient to better interpret the period

params.title: Alert On Change
params.content: You can enable a notification every time it changes direction
